article.title: U.S. Navy To Receive Advanced Mission Computers from General Dynamics
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: General Dynamics Advanced Information Systems, Fairfax, Virginia, has been awarded an $18 million contract for U.S. Navy F/A-18 mission computers. Under terms of the agreement, the company will produce Type-3 advanced mission computers for the F/A-18E/F and E/A-18G Super Hornet aircraft.
